sentences.sContent: They brainwash people into giving up all their money.
sentences.sCn: 他们给人们洗脑,使他们放弃他们所有的钱。

words.tran: 对…洗脑；把思想强行灌输给（brainwash的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: If you brainwash someone, you force them to believe something by continually telling them that it is true, and preventing them from thinking about it properly
